Control Name: Establishes Communication Protocols for Vendors and Business Partners—The entity establishes communication and resolution protocols for service or product issues related to vendors and business partners.

control_attributes.Control: Establishes Communication Protocols for Vendors and Business Partners—The entity establishes communication and resolution protocols for service or product issues related to vendors and business partners.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC9.2 The entity assesses and manages risks associated with vendors and business partners.
